cs213.photoAlbum.control

Interface IController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Controller

    public interface IController
    Controller allows for communication between the model and the view. Controller does all manipulation, searching and validity checks of data.
    Author:
    Zack Colello and Anna Genke

        Creates and adds a new instance of user to the database in backend, if the User does not already exist
        Parameters:
        id - String that represents the id of a User
        fullName - String that represents the fullname of a user
        Returns:
        True of the User was successfully added to the database, and false otherwise

        Parameters:
        id - String that is the id of the user
        fileName - String that is the path to the photo
        caption - String that is the caption of the photo
        albumName - String that is the name of the album

      • movePhoto

        int movePhoto(java.lang.String id,
              java.lang.String fileName,
              java.lang.String oldAlbum,
              java.lang.String newAlbum)
        Moves a photo from one album to another
        Parameters:
        id - String that is the id of the User
        fileName - String that is the path to the photo
        oldAlbum - String that is the name of the old album
        newAlbum - String that is the name of the new album
        Returns:
        1 on successful move, -1 if the photo did not exist in old album, -2 otherwise

      • removePhoto

        boolean removePhoto(java.lang.String id,
                    java.lang.String fileName,
                    java.lang.String AlbumName)
        Removes a photo from a given id's album
        Parameters:
        id - String with the id for the user for photo to be removed
        fileName - String with the name of the photo to be removed
        AlbumName - String with the name of the album for the photo to be removed
        Returns:
        True on successful photo removal, false on failure

        type - String with name of tag type to be removed
        value - String with name of tag value to be removed
        Returns:

        startDate - String with the starting date of photos to be returned
